classes.cCustomNote: Any Free Elective course can go here. Recommended: BUS100.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, Lower-Division F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

Any ECON Elective (400 level) course can go here.

Choose one of the following: BUS391, ECON395, or CSC101.

Students who take BUS391 (4 units) must also take BUS392 (4 units). Choosing BUS391 & BUS392 will reduce Free Electives to 4 units (vs 8). Students may also substitute ECON395 during the junior year for CSC101 or BUS391 & BUS392.

Choose one of the following: BUS392, or Free Elective

Students who take BUS391 (4 units) must also take BUS392 (4 units). Choosing BUS391 & BUS392 will reduce Free Electives to 4 units (vs 8). Students may also substitute ECON395 during the junior year for CSC101 or BUS391 & BUS392.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR course or GWR exam can go here. Refer to the current catalog for prerequisites.
Any ECON Elective (400 level) course can go here.
Any Approved Elective course can go here. 4 units Approved Electives required. See the catalog for course options.
